trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies the scroll bar type. This parameter can be one of the following values:

seg-source.mrk: This parameter can be one of the following values:

target.mrk: This parameter can be one of the following values:

trans-unit.source: $SB_BOTH - Enables or disables the arrows on the horizontal and vertical scroll bars associated with the specified window.

seg-source.mrk: $SB_BOTH - Enables or disables the arrows on the horizontal and vertical scroll bars associated with the specified window.

target.mrk: $SB_BOTH - Enables or disables the arrows on the horizontal and vertical scroll bars associated with the specified window.

trans-unit.source: $SB_CTL - Indicates that the scroll bar is a scroll bar control. The $hWnd must be the handle to the scroll bar control.

seg-source.mrk: $SB_CTL - Indicates that the scroll bar is a scroll bar control.
The $hWnd must be the handle to the scroll bar control.

target.mrk: $SB_CTL - Indicates that the scroll bar is a scroll bar control.
The $hWnd must be the handle to the scroll bar control.

trans-unit.source: $SB_HORZ - Enables or disables the arrows on the horizontal scroll bar associated with the specified window.

seg-source.mrk: $SB_HORZ - Enables or disables the arrows on the horizontal scroll bar associated with the specified window.

target.mrk: $SB_HORZ - Enables or disables the arrows on the horizontal scroll bar associated with the specified window.

trans-unit.source: $SB_VERT - Enables or disables the arrows on the vertical scroll bar associated with the specified window.

seg-source.mrk: $SB_VERT - Enables or disables the arrows on the vertical scroll bar associated with the specified window.

target.mrk: $SB_VERT - Enables or disables the arrows on the vertical scroll bar associated with the specified window.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies whether the scroll bar arrows are enabled or disabled and indicates which arrows are enabled or disabled.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies whether the scroll bar arrows are enabled or disabled and indicates which arrows are enabled or disabled.

target.mrk: Specifies whether the scroll bar arrows are enabled or disabled and indicates which arrows are enabled or disabled.

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be one of the following values

seg-source.mrk: This parameter can be one of the following values

target.mrk: This parameter can be one of the following values

trans-unit.source: $ESB_DISABLE_BOTH - Disables both arrows on a scroll bar.

seg-source.mrk: $ESB_DISABLE_BOTH - Disables both arrows on a scroll bar.

target.mrk: $ESB_DISABLE_BOTH - Disables both arrows on a scroll bar.

trans-unit.source: $ESB_DISABLE_DOWN - Disables the down arrow on a vertical scroll bar.

seg-source.mrk: $ESB_DISABLE_DOWN - Disables the down arrow on a vertical scroll bar.

target.mrk: $ESB_DISABLE_DOWN - Disables the down arrow on a vertical scroll bar.

trans-unit.source: $ESB_DISABLE_LEFT - Disables the left arrow on a horizontal scroll bar.

seg-source.mrk: $ESB_DISABLE_LEFT - Disables the left arrow on a horizontal scroll bar.

target.mrk: $ESB_DISABLE_LEFT - Disables the left arrow on a horizontal scroll bar.

trans-unit.source: $ESB_DISABLE_LTUP - Disables the left arrow on a horizontal scroll bar or the up arrow of a vertical scroll bar.

seg-source.mrk: $ESB_DISABLE_LTUP - Disables the left arrow on a horizontal scroll bar or the up arrow of a vertical scroll bar.

target.mrk: $ESB_DISABLE_LTUP - Disables the left arrow on a horizontal scroll bar or the up arrow of a vertical scroll bar.

trans-unit.source: $ESB_DISABLE_RIGHT - Disables the right arrow on a horizontal scroll bar.

seg-source.mrk: $ESB_DISABLE_RIGHT - Disables the right arrow on a horizontal scroll bar.

target.mrk: $ESB_DISABLE_RIGHT - Disables the right arrow on a horizontal scroll bar.

trans-unit.source: $ESB_DISABLE_RTDN - Disables the right arrow on a horizontal scroll bar or the down arrow of a vertical scroll bar.

seg-source.mrk: $ESB_DISABLE_RTDN - Disables the right arrow on a horizontal scroll bar or the down arrow of a vertical scroll bar.

target.mrk: $ESB_DISABLE_RTDN - Disables the right arrow on a horizontal scroll bar or the down arrow of a vertical scroll bar.

trans-unit.source: $ESB_DISABLE_UP - Disables the up arrow on a vertical scroll bar.

seg-source.mrk: $ESB_DISABLE_UP - Disables the up arrow on a vertical scroll bar.

target.mrk: $ESB_DISABLE_UP - Disables the up arrow on a vertical scroll bar.

trans-unit.source: $ESB_ENABLE_BOTH - Enables both arrows on a scroll bar.

seg-source.mrk: $ESB_ENABLE_BOTH - Enables both arrows on a scroll bar.

target.mrk: $ESB_ENABLE_BOTH - Enables both arrows on a scroll bar.

trans-unit.source: Write a line to the memo control

seg-source.mrk: Write a line to the memo control

target.mrk: Write a line to the memo control
